author: Reuters
title: Trump says US halting World Health Organization funding over its handling of virus
description: The President said the group had promoted China's “disinformation” about the virus that likely led to a wider outbreak of the virus than otherwise would have occurred.
content:
WASHINGTON U.S. President Donald Trump said on Tuesday he has instructed his administration to at least temporarily halt funding to the World Health Organization over its handling of the coronavirus pandemic.
Mr. Trump, at a White House news conference, said… [+224 chars]
